mapper.sql: SELECT qnaseq, id, regdate, content, title, checks FROM qna
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_seq, id, regdate, content, title, checks, recontent, reregdate, remark, image) values(qna_seq.nextval, #{id}, to_date(#{regdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{content}, #{title}, #{checks}, #{recontent}, #{reregdate}, #{remark}, #{image})
